ygData.subject: Re: Fury
ygData.msgSnippet: The explosion sent Megatron careening away, luckily the recoil had pushed him far enough away, as not to wreck him anymore. He had planned on scrapping this

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

The explosion sent Megatron careening away, luckily the recoil had
pushed him far enough away, as not to wreck him anymore. He had planned
on scrapping this false Decepticon, then maybe Speedbreaker for bringing
him here, but h heard Shockwave's voice. He strugled to stand, then felt
oil pump through his wires, from the fight, and felt strong. He looked
at Shockwave with a ripped up face, only one of his eyes whirled to life
to take in his former Guardian of Cybertron. His mouth barely moved as
he spoke. "Megatron claims nothing. HE IS." Megatron yelled. "You have
been busy Shockwave." Megatron said motioning to Unitron. "But this
fight proved nothing, except I can, and will scrap you as well. It
proves not wether I am Megatron or not. But the power I display proves I
am worthy of Leadership." Megatron said, stepping foreward. He through
his cannon to the ground, it landing with a thud. "Decepticons, do not
fire on Shockwave, I trust him, with all my Spark." Megatron said,
nodding. He walked forward. "Do you not remember Shockwave. When we
joined together, all those millions of years ago. Conquest was one and
all. We as Cybertronians are superior, and we deserve it. You and I had
a kinship, I felt with no other Decepticon. Not Soundwave, not
Starscream, no one. That is why I left you in charge of Cybertron."
Megatron then smiled. "If you wish to destroy me now, then try, but you
will only be crushing our dream." he finished, looking over the purple
Cyclops.
